column1: [Goldberg] Kai Jones, who worked out in Golden State today, said the Warriors made it known that they are in "win-now mode" and expect anyone they pick to be able to contribute immediately.
In an Instagram poll that asked Kings fans whether they'd want the team to draft Kai Jones or Moses Moody, Moses Moody chimed in. He voted for Kai Jones.
